name: Stages (RebekahAmberClark)
description:
How do you escape your own thoughts? 

Play as a character dreaming that she's trapped on a series of theatre stages in this story-driven journey of emotion. Explore, interact with your surroundings, and search for a way out. At times, it may feel like there's no way out, but hang in there. 

You'll make it.

FEATURES:

  • full voice acting - over 150 lines of fully voiced dialogue
  • simple gameplay and controls - no expert gaming skills needed
  • emotional narrative experience - this game deals with subjects of grief, loss, and depression

"Stages" was made in RPG Maker and is the developer's first game.
